subject: PE Today: Summer of Steroids?
body:
CBSNews.com












Summer 
      of Steroids?The 
      combination of a grisly double-murder/suicide by a professional 
      wrestler, the about-to-boil-over Major League Baseball steroid 
      investigation and Barry Bonds' pursuit of the all-time home run record may 
      offer the media the summer story that they have become known for in 
      recent years.[+ Read More]

Stumbling 
      On AstroturfHere at Public Eye, we've gotten more 
      than 400 emails complaining about Jeff Greenfield's Friday piece on the 
      film "Sicko" -- the result of an e-mail 
      campaign orchestrated by Fairness and Accuracy in Reporting. (FAIR)  
      The results have been discouraging, with most  respondents not taking 
      this opportunity to engage in a constructive discussion, but merely 
      attack and complain.  Some have even cut-and-pasted FAIR's comment 
      into e-mails.[+ Read More]

The 
      Future of Broadcast News?Having reported on a local news experiment 
      over the past month, Public Eye has seen the (potential) future of 
      news.  Click if you dare.[+ Read More]
